# Raveo

> Cloudflare-native open-core CMS platform combining PayloadCMS with edge computing infrastructure.

## About

Raveo is a modern web platform built on Cloudflare Workers, PayloadCMS, and Astro. It provides a headless CMS with edge-deployed frontend, enabling fast, AI-discoverable websites.

## Technology

- Runtime: Cloudflare Workers (V8 isolate, 200+ locations)
- CMS: PayloadCMS 3.x (headless, TypeScript-native)
- Frontend: Astro v6 (Cloudflare-native)
- Database: Cloudflare D1 (serverless SQLite)
- Storage: Cloudflare R2 (S3-compatible)
- Cache: Cloudflare KV (sub-ms edge reads)

## Content

- Blog: /blog
- Sitemap: /sitemap.xml
